" href="rider/fabio-sabatini"></a><span>SABATINI Fabio</span></li><li><a style="background: url(images/riders/bp/df/guillaume-van-keirsbulck-2015.jpg) no-repeat -10px 0; background-size: 110px; " href="rider/guillaume-van-keirsbulck"></a><span>VAN KEIRSBULCK Guillaume</span></li><li><a style="background: url(images/riders/bp/fe/julien-vermote-2015.jpg) no-repeat -10px 0; " href="rider/iljo-keisse"></a><span>KEISSE Iljo</span></li><li><a style="background: url(images/riders/bp/ec/lukasz-wisniowski-2015.jpg) no-repeat -10px 0; background-size: 110px; " href="rider/lukasz-wisniowski"></a><span>WIŚNIOWSKI Łukasz</span></li><li><a style="background: url(images/riders/bp/fb/martin-velits-2015.jpg) no-repeat -10px 0; <div class="hide ttabs tabc">
<span class="table-cont"><ul class="list pad2" style=" "><li class=""><div>1</div><div><span class="flag co"></span> <a href="rider/fernando-gaviria">GAVIRIA Fernando</a></div><div class="right   ">20</div><div class="clear"></div></li>

<li class=""><div>6</div><div><span class="flag pl"></span> <a href="rider/lukasz-wisniowski">WIŚNIOWSKI Łukasz</a></div><div class="right   ">23</div><div class="clear"></div></li>

  $(document).ready(function(){
    $(".sortriders li a").click(function(e){  e.preventDefault();  $('.ttabs').hide();  $(".sortriders li").removeClass('cur'); $(this).parent('li').addClass('cur');   $('.'+$(this).parent('li').attr('class').substr(0,4)).show();   });
    $('.expand-list').click(function(e){      $('.photos li').show();    }); 
  });
  </script>
